channel.title: CVE Feed for Digital Alert Systems -- DASDEC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digital Alert Systems -- DASDEC

item.title: CVE-2022-40204|2024-08-03T12:14:39.899Z -- digital%20alert%20systems -- dasdec
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in all current versions of Digital Alert Systems DASDEC software via the Host Header in undisclosed pages after login.
